### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.1.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "605f308503c5b3555bb5fb62d800ca75cb6203e06274df21070380db419c64b4",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/5.1.0/rules_ios.5.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Revert "Add headers to `headermap` action `inputs`" by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/893
* Fix apple_library rule not working in sandbox when do `SwiftCompile` in mixed sources by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/894
* Add sandbox mode to CI testing matrix by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/895
* Avoid umbrella header crash error in remote compilation when no default umbrella header generated by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/897
* Remove extended modulemap from swiftc_inputs by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/900
* Add CI tests for latest rules_swift and rules_apple by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/899
* Fix rules_swift 2 compatibility issues by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/903
* Fix import_middleman broken with Bazel 7 + sandbox mode by @gyfelton in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/910
* Ensures the determinism of vfsoverlay file by @congt in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/912


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/5.0.0...5.1.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "5.0.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "d1cc852aa9e989c12b802e04cb66dfe51418153c781d6073bb30e82284866865",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/5.0.0/rules_ios.5.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Remove support for xcodeproj rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/883
* CI: Bazel 7 tests use Build without the Bytes by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/886
* Add headers to `headermap` action `inputs` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/888
* Add `direct_public_headers` to CcInfo `compilation_context` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/889
* Remove usage of predeclared outputs from rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/891
* Remove `_headermap_builder` from `framework.bzl` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/890
* Handle `swift.swift_disable_import_underlying_module` in `features` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/892


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.8.2...5.0.0

### Bzlmod Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_ios", version = "4.8.2", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_ios")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "340eb31622a32efa0af82531e0c9c94acb112b221addaea498f8963c4f3956d9",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/4.8.2/rules_ios.4.8.2.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```

## What's Changed
* Disable builtin CC toolchain for BCR tests by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/868
* Stop processing data twice in make_vfsoverlay by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/871
* Update usage of `to_json` to `json.encode` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/872


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.4.0...4.5.0

## What's Changed
* CI: improvements for stability by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/861
* Do not declare force_load and VFS targets unnecessarily by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/858
* Update and fix for rules_apple 3.5.0 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/864
* Removed fake_rule_label from precompiled_apple_resource_bundle_impl and using swift_module instead by @tymurmustafaiev in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/865

## What's Changed
* Add support for apple platform command line options by @karim-alweheshy in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/816
* Update CI for latest actions and to use matrix by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/841
* Fix duplicate symbols for test rules by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/844
* Update: use `use_cpp_toolchain` for toolchains by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/845
* Remove split_transition_rule_attrs to simplify transition_support by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/846
* Update toolchains support for latest rules_apple and transitions by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/848
* Update transition support by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/847
* Allow consumers to set always_include_developer_search_paths in swift_library by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/852
* Forward package_name to swift_library part of apple_library by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/853
* Safer objc_provider assignment in apple_framework_packaging by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/855


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/4.1.0...4.2.0

## What's Changed
* Update from Bazel 6.1.2 to Bazel 6.3.2 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/777
* Move to using `write_file` from Bazel Skylib by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/778
* Fix marking of development dependencies by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/782
* Update stardoc for bzlmod by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/776
* Support rules_apple 3.x.x by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/773
* Update dependencies and use latest archives by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/784
* Add Bazel central registry files by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/780


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/2.3.1...3.0.0

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_ios",
    sha256 = "f8ba34d4e6584334ba22cdfd840e7b454a2030d4ca45eeeb7bc6a49d5a25ece0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/releases/download/2.3.1/rules_ios.2.3.1.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_ios//rules:repositories.bzl",
    "rules_ios_dependencies"
)

rules_ios_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()

load(
    "@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl",
    "protobuf_deps",
)

protobuf_deps()
```


## What's Changed
* Add support for bzlmod by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/703
* Update tart to 0.35.2 to cached version by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/774
* Fix compile only aspect for swift_test targets by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/775


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/2.3.0...2.3.1

## What's Changed
* Repro Error: create_swift_module() got unexpected keyword argument: sy… by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/738
* Make symbol_graph argument conditional by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/739
* Fix product_type when using `link_dynamic` by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/741
* Differentiate `output_discriminator` when using `link_dynamic` by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/743
* Add ability to disable passing the -import-underlying-module copt to swift_library targets by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/745
* Remove invalid product type by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/744
* Pass xccurrentversions explicitly in AppleResourceInfo.datamodels by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/747
* Set xccurrentversion owners by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/748
* Revert xccurrentversion changes by @thiagohmcruz in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/753
* Turn off remote cache for local dev, cleanup github actions UI clutter by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/749
* [Test] Break massive ios_test function into factory by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/754
* Drops support for xchammer and xcbuildkit by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/762
* Fix warnings for a missing base class and pointer mismatch by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/763
* [Bazel 6.x.x] sdk_dylib at _end_ of the linker invocation by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/766
* [Bazel 6.x.x] sim_arm64 middleman fixes by @jerrymarino in https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/pull/767


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-ios/rules_ios/compare/2.1.0...2.2.0
